revised_title: Stress-Systems in Solids of Revolution: Torsion, Shearing, and Flexural Stresses
tldr: The author applies the semi-indirect method of Saint Venant to determine stress distributions in solids of revolution, such as twisted shafts, pressure vessels, and incomplete tores like helical springs. The paper provides a background for future work on relaxation methods and offers a more suitable approach for stress analysis compared to earlier solutions.
